devdoc.details: A contract that acts as a central beacon for fetching random numbers from Chainlink VRF. Multiple requests within an `EPOCH_PERIOD` (as defined by VRFBeacon deployer) will be coupled into one request to `VRFCoordiantorV2`. An `EPOCH_PERIOD` is simply a block range. Consumers of `VRFBeacon` will use the one random number as a seed to generate another random number for the contract's own use case.

epochBlock(uint256).details: Return when epoch expires. Eg. blockNumber=0-99, period=100 => 100

returns.requestId: of the EPOCH_PERIOD that `blockNumber` is in

requestRandomness().details: Requests randomness from a block hash
